itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying deer, sheep, or fox hide. It requires the knowledge of Drying: Beginner.

※ Find Techthon in Heidel and complete the Need for Soft Hide! Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Deer Hide
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Tanning a hunted deer corpse.

item.name: Sheep Hide
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Tanning a hunted sheep corpse.

item.name: Fox Hide
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Tanning a hunted fox corpse.

item.name: Soft Hide
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying deer, sheep, or fox hide.

item.name: Wagon Registration: Noble Wagon
item.desc:
Proof of ownership of a <Noble Wagon>, allowing you to access it at a Stable.
- Inventory Slot(s): 20, Acceleration: 95%, Speed: 95%, Turn: 95%, Braking: 95%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Wagon License
 1. Right-click the Wagon License and move to the designated Stable.
 2. Talk to the Stable Keeper and select the Stable menu.
 3. Click on the Register Emblem menu and right-click on the Wagon License.
 4. Enter the Wagon’s name and select Confirm to register the Wagon.
 5. Select the registered Wagon and click on the Find menu.

item.name: Wagon Registration: White Wagon
item.desc:
Proof of ownership of a <White Wagon>, allowing you to access it at a Stable.
- Inventory Slot(s): 12, Acceleration: 110%, Speed: 110%, Turn: 120%, Braking: 120%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Wagon License
 1. Right-click the Wagon License and move to the designated Stable.
 2. Talk to the Stable Keeper and select the Stable menu.
 3. Click on the Register Emblem menu and right-click on the Wagon License.
 4. Enter the Wagon’s name and select Confirm to register the Wagon.
 5. Select the registered Wagon and click on the Find menu.

item.name: Talis Shoes
item.desc: This armor has reduced defense in return for better flexibility. Mostly worn by nobles.\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect

item.desc: Energy of intimidation is contained within this Talis Shoes\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Talis Shoes of Duress, Talis Shoes

item.name: Supreme Soft Hide
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Shaking Fine Soft Hide and Leather Glaze, an ingredient made through Alchemy. It requires the knowledge of Shaking: Skilled.

※ Shaking: Skilled can be obtained as a challenge reward after achieving Processing Artisan Level 1.

item.name: Blue Sheep Hide Cushion
item.desc: A blue cushion made of Sheep Hide.

item.name: Red Sheep Hide Cushion
item.desc: A red cushion made of Sheep Hide.

item.name: White Sheep Hide Cushion
item.desc: A white cushion made of Sheep Hide.
